pure interface of class zeta.content.zirp.Type

The documentated page. 
public class Type
{
    public static final Slot slot;
    public static void put(Annotation an,
                           Expr type);
    public static Expr get(Annotation an);
    public static boolean isProvided(Annotation an);
    public static Expr makeGiven(Name name);
    public static Expr makeGenGiven(Name name,
                                    Expr[] actuals);
    public static Expr makePower(Expr type);
    public static Expr makeProduct(Expr[] components);
    public static Expr makeSignature(Name[] names,
                                     Expr[] types);
    public static Expr makeVar(Name name);
    public static Expr substitute(Expr type,
                                  Name[] names,
                                  Expr[] types);
    private static class Substitutor
      extends TermVisitor
    public static Format toPrettyFormat(Expr type);
    public static final Variable anyType;
    public static void unify(Expr l,
                             Expr r)
      throws UnificationFailure;
    public static class UnificationFailure
      extends Exception
    public Type();
}
